active_incidents.title: “Time when workflow started” variable is missing from Workflow Builder steps

notes.body: We’ve identified the cause of this issue with this Workflow Builder variable and we’re working on getting a fix out as soon as possible. We appreciate you bearing with us in the meantime.
We’re working to fix this issue with this Workflow Builder variable and will post an update here when we have more to share. Thanks for your patience.
We're still investigating this issue but don't have anything further to share at this time. We'll be back with another update in 30 minutes.

The “Time when workflow started” variable is missing from all steps of the Workflow Builder. It is missing for new workflow configurations, and existing workflows using “Time when workflow started” are still running but may have incomplete data for this variable. We are currently investigating this and apologize for any inconvenience.
